docs.snippet: More than half of the total tonnage of seagoing tankers now carries the American flag, according to a compilation released here yesterday by the American Merchant Marine Institute.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Sept. 8 -- The possibility of a third World War was raised today by the Palestine Arab Higher Committee in a bitter attack on both the majority and the minority reports of the United Nations Special Committee on Palestine.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N. Y., Sept 12 -- A United Nations General Assembly's special committee agreed today that the transmission of information by colonial powers on the development of self-governing institutions" in territories should be encouraged.

docs.snippet: A Federal loan fund for meritorious students wishing to embark upon a medical career was advocated last night at the colorful convocation ceremonies of the American College of Surgeons in the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel. The proposal was made by Prof....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Federal loan fund for meritorious students wishing to embark upon a medical career was advocated last night at the colorful convocation ceremonies of the American College of Surgeons in the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel. The proposal was made by Prof. Andrew C. Ivy, internationally known physiologist and vice president of the University of Illinois.

docs.snippet: With disputes between the great powers even more acute than they were a year ago, the United Nations General Assembly will convene at Flushing Meadow, Queens, on Tuesday amid cautious hopes that it will succeed in reviving confidence in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: With disputes between the great powers even more acute than they were a year ago, the United Nations General Assembly will convene at Flushing Meadow, Queens, on Tuesday amid cautious hopes that it will succeed in reviving confidence in the organization.

docs.lead_paragraph: To U.S. and U.N. For Secretary of State George Marshall the pressure of work last week was much like the wartime pressure that had been on Chief of Staff George Marshall when he prepared a major offensive. The Secretary, 66, said that there were not enough hours in the day to do all that had to be done.

docs.snippet: To THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Who are the warmongers? Those who (as did I in my letter to THE TIMES of Sept. 3) urge American suppport of the majority report of the United Nations Special Committee of Palestine or those who (as did Khab Totah...
docs.lead_paragraph: To THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Who are the warmongers? Those who (as did I in my letter to THE TIMES of Sept. 3) urge American suppport of the majority report of the United Nations Special Committee of Palestine or those who (as did Khab Totah in his letter to THE TIMES of Sept. 10) threaten war if the Assembly of the United Nations dares to accept the partition, program of its committee?

headline.main: Arab Threats of War; Inconsistency of Statements by U.N. Members Pointed Out

docs.snippet: John D.L. Hood, Australian member of the United Nations special committee of inquiry on Palestine, refused to support either the majority or the minority recommendation of the committee because he felt that the committee's report should present both...
docs.lead_paragraph: John D.L. Hood, Australian member of the United Nations special committee of inquiry on Palestine, refused to support either the majority or the minority recommendation of the committee because he felt that the committee's report should present both plans without recommending either.
